Utility-based animations for the web.

    Go to docs

    GSAP Powered

    Built on top of GSAP for production-grade animation control.

    Utility Syntax

    Author animations in HTML with concise, composable tokens.

    Responsive by Default

    Define responsive animation variants with breakpoint modifiers.

    Timeline Ready

    Sequence or parallelize motion with timeline utilities. Chain animations with precise control over timing and order.

    Dot Notation

    Target nested GSAP properties with a readable dot syntax.

    Composable

    Layer presets and overrides without fighting configs. Build complex animations from simple, reusable pieces.

    Lightweight

    Tiny runtime footprint with minimal overhead. Ships only what you need for smooth, performant animations.

    Extensible

    Designed to support additional animation backends over time.
